channel.title: What should I buy?
channel.description:
Ohai mopar, I've decided to start runescape again for when I'm not doing anything. I've got 26m to spend and I've already got veracs, a whip and various other items. I've got 74 attack soon to be 75, I was wondering if I should get a godsword and what type. I've got 70+ in all combat stats, so please tell me what I should buy. And I don't want to go buying an item that's gonna crash in the next 3 days, lol.
P.S I know next to nothing about runescape now, so all of these new items names you're probably going to throw at me are going to need to be explained further.
EDIT: If anyone wants to throw in some nice money making ideas that would be great.

item.title: What should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

sdfu

Read full topic

item.title: What should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:36, topic:389059”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=484874.msg3555369#msg3555369 date=1301851645]

You can’t lose your item. As the Jagex mod says right there, you never really lose it in the first place, it just goes into a different part of your account that you cannot see until the time has expired or w/e.

It is real. It happened to 2 of my friends in-game, but they received their items back after contacting Jagex. Stop claiming it’s not real just because of the lack of proof.
[/quote]

I googled it. Nothing came up. People would be complaining if it were real.[/quote]Exactly, I also browsed the forums for about an hour in the report section… nothing came up

Read full topic

[quote=“kingman002, post:31, topic:389059”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=484874.msg3555586#msg3555586 date=1301859555]

[quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=484874.msg3554397#msg3554397 date=1301776243]

You can’t lose your item. As the Jagex mod says right there, you never really lose it in the first place, it just goes into a different part of your account that you cannot see until the time has expired or w/e.

Did you even read the date of that post? The glitch is recent and real.
[/quote]How can there be a new glitch if they haven’t updated it

I just did a bit of searching for any accounts of this besides what you guys have said, there is nothing else…

You can’t lose your item. As the Jagex mod says right there, you never really lose it in the first place, it just goes into a different part of your account that you cannot see until the time has expired or w/e.

It is real. It happened to 2 of my friends in-game, but they received their items back after contacting Jagex. Stop claiming it’s not real just because of the lack of proof.
[/quote]Yea it just happened to me as well, just lost my white party hat I contacted jagex hopefully they can give it back

EDIT - And don’t say it’s not real just because I don’t have proof.

How can I contact Jagex? I want my whip back :(.[/quote]I suggest you check your returned items box

item.title: What should I buy?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Item Lending

Item Lending is a feature released on 14 July 2008 that allows all players (free and members) to lend their items to friends for up to 72 hours, or until either player logs out. Jagex first announced the development of Item Lending on the 17th of...

I believe it would be in there if it happened to more than one person.

Also,

It’s not real.

Read full topic

[/quote]I call bull shit?

Its real, Happened to my mate LOL.
[/quote]My guess is you guys accidentally traded it instead of right clicked and lent it…[/quote]

Are you fucked? It is real… No sarcasm.
